CustomField.description: Controls how PII is detected and masked. Hybrid (default) uses both schema-based (Data Classification) and pattern-based (regex) detection. Schema-Only uses only field Data Classifications. Pattern-Only uses only regex patterns for free text.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Hybrid: Best coverage using both methods. Schema-Only: Only fields marked Confidential/Restricted. Pattern-Only: Only regex pattern matching.
CustomField.label: PII Masking Mode
